data.eml:eml: Notes on the genus Mada Mulsant with description of a new Andean species (Coleoptera: Coccinellidae: Epilachnini)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Szawaryn, Karol (2015): Notes on the genus Mada Mulsant with description of a new Andean species (Coleoptera: Coccinellidae: Epilachnini). Zootaxa 3936 (2): 281-286, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3936.2.8
